DOC.criteria: Is 40 48 year age ( inclusive ) . Has read sign Informed Consent . Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule . Wears read spectacle close work . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply . Eye injury surgery within twelve week enrollment . Evidence systemic ocular abnormality , infection , disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution . Currently enrol clinical trial . Has wear contact lenses previously . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
